scripts.postinstall: yarn npmVersionsCheck && yarn build && yarn patchElectronJestRunner
scripts.test-all: yarn test && yarn test-cli && yarn test-electron && yarn test-electron-cli
scripts.i18n-scan-ace-report: node ./scripts/translate-scan.js "packages/ace-report/src" "packages/ace-report/src/l10n/locales/temp.json" && sync-i18n --files 'packages/ace-report/src/l10n/locales/*.json' --primary temp --languages en fr pt_BR es da --space 4 --finalnewline --newkeysempty && rimraf "packages/ace-report/src/l10n/locales/temp.json"
